titleStmt.title: Trve intelligence from Ireland being two letters sent from Dublin by men of good repute the 25 of Aprill 1642, by the last post : vvherein is related the victorious proceedings of the Protestants against the rebells in Ireland.
titleStmt.author: E. V.
Lynne, M.

notesStmt.note: The second letter signed: M. Lynne.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
